docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_T3DSO1XXX block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This block should work with any Teledyne LeCroy T3DSO1000(A)-2000 series oscilloscope.
docstring.short_description: Turn the display of the channels on or off on an T3DSO1000(A)-2000 oscilloscope.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECT_T3DSO1XXX block)
